Details:

The driver "PLCCom for S7" allows software developers to read and write operands of a S7 (200, 300, 400, 1200, 1500 series, WinAC RTX and Logo!)

See:
          Description

Packages
PLCCom  

 

Details:

The driver "PLCCom for S7" allows software developers to read and write operands of a S7 (200, 300, 400, 1200, 1500 series, WinAC RTX and Logo!) or S7-compatible controller (eg. VIPA 100V/200V/300V/300S, Saia, Berthel).

The driver will be dilivered with Code-Examples, which shows you how easy it is to connect the PLC to your application.

If you have any questions about the product you could also use the online help and/or our product forum.

To communicate with more than one PLC at the same time is one of the advantage of the PLCCom S7.

Intern routines are optimized to high performance access.

The whole library based 100% on the Java SDK and can directly bound as a reference to your project. It won't need API-calls. It is free of problems to use the driver on a 32 or 64 bit system.

Communication:

Serial adapter MPI, Serial adapter PPI, MPI adapter USB, Ethernet TCP/IP, Green Cable (VIPA PLC only)

The driver can be used with the java SDK from version 1.5

Functionality (depends on PLC-Type):

  • Read and write functions of the following data types
    • Raw *
    • Bit *
    • Byte *
    • Word *
    • Double word *
    • Real / Float *
    • Unicode Char *
    • INT *
    • DINT*
    • 16Bit BCD *
    • Date and time values *
    • String values *
    • S7 String values *
      •
  • Reading timers
  • Reading counters
  • Participants identify (CPUs located in the MPI-ring)
  • Start and stopp of the CPU
  • Reading of PLC serialnumber and firmware version
  • Reading the position of Key switch
  • Reading LED-Infos
  • Get block list
  • Reading length of Blocks and get more information
  • Backup blocks and plc code
  • Restore and rename blocks and plc coder
  • Delete blocks
  • Reading diagnostic infos
  • sets the password for the access protection
  • Reading the system status lists

* (Input, output, flags, data block)

Supported features depending on PLC type

S7-400

S7-200

(from version 2010)
